mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring.payment (pay_id, ord_id, mem_id, code_name, tot_prod_name, tot_pay_price, pay_way, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{pay_id},#{ord_id},#{mem_id},#{code_name},#{tot_prod_name},#{tot_pay_price},#{pay_way},#{rg_num},#{md_num});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spring.payment WHERE code_name = 'PAYMENT_COMPLETE' and pay_id = #{pay_id};
